# EDA
```{r}
table(pottery$kiln)
table(region)
library(tidyverse)
apply(X=select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO),2,FUN=function(x){summary(x)})
plot(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO), pch=19, col=region) # new scatter plot
library(GGally)
ggcorr(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO),label = T, label_size = 3, label_round = 2)
```

# PCA
```{r}
std.data <- scale(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO))
pc.out <- prcomp(std.data)
summary(pc.out)
plot(pc.out,type="l")
# bi-plot
```

```{r}
library(WVPlots) 

PairPlot(pottery, 
         colnames(pottery)[1:9], 
         "Title", 
         group_var = "kiln")
```
